segments.speaker: Cooksey
segments.text: We've started something really exciting and we want you to be the first to know about it.

segments.speaker: Cooksey
segments.text: We're calling it the Operating System for Creators.

segments.speaker: Cooksey
segments.text: This means smoother workflows, fewer disruptions, and more opportunities to create amazing work.

segments.speaker: Cooksey
segments.text: We're not trying to automate creativity itself. We want to take away the mundane tasks that hold you back.

segments.speaker: Cooksey
segments.text: This is just the beginning. Who knows where we'll end up, but it's going to be big.
